current_challenge.title: Meatless Monday
current_challenge.description: Today, commit to going meatless for all your meals. Opt for plant-based alternatives such as fruits, vegetables, grains, and legumes. Try out a new meatless recipe for dinner to make it fun and exciting!
current_challenge.impact: By skipping meat for a day, you can reduce your carbon footprint and lower greenhouse gas emissions associated with animal agriculture.
